thread.title: maria 66

author: maria 66
title: maria 66
text:
Brilliant service ordered in the afternoon and received my items the next day. These are fantastic and are helping with my balance and coresstrength .
They are strongly made and extremely good value for money. The only thing I have to do is hide them from the dog as he loved my other exercise ball , could balance wel until he bit it in play
Would highly recommend both company and products
